name: Anton's Balloon Play!
description:
YOU WILL NEED 2 - 4 PLAYERS TO PLAY!!!
Anton's Balloon Play is a take on the Party game Balloon Bang from WarioWare Mega Party Game$.

Play as the Antonball/Antonblast characters of all time, including Wario for some reason.

BTW: the Mario Sprites in the options are by RatherNoiceSprites on Spriter's Resource
